folders.name: Auth
folders.description: Principal apis to register and authorize.

folders.name: Register
folders.description: The register require validation using the phone number.

requests.name: Authorize with RUT
requests.description: Use it to authorize the user using RUT.

requests.name: Authorize with Firebase
requests.description:
Require a `id_token` from firebase auth to register an user.

This return an `access_token` and a `refresh_token`.

*warning*: this endpoint revoke the firebase refresh token.

requests.name: Active Register
requests.description: Use to active the user with code.

requests.name: Authorize with Email
requests.description: Use it to authorize the user using email.

requests.name: Register by RUT
requests.description: Use to register a new user.

pathVariableData.description: User Id, Use `me` to get user id from `access_token`.

requests.name: Health
requests.description:
It is used to inspect the state api service.

The parameter `status` returns `pass` if there is no problem. `warn` if there are momentary problems or it is unstable. and `fail` if the service is inaccessible.

pathVariableData.description: User Id, Use `me` to get user id from `access_token`.

requests.name: Refresh Token
requests.description: Allows the re-creation of a valid access token, invalidating the previous refresh token.
